title: The Modern lithographer
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A detailed study of the techniques of lithographic artists, and the process of duplicating black and white originals by means of direct and offset lithography. The roles of the commercial photographer and the modern printing press in the mass production of attractive art prints, including advertising materials, are shown.
